content: Hi, I want to know, if there is demo application using Fhir and AWS together. for example how to communicate with hospitals apis from Lambda functions.

Not sure exactly what you are looking for with this. I use AWS lambdas (and API Gateway) for http://ods.clarotech.co.uk/

These lambdas receive a FHIR REST call and translate it to another API and then respond using FHIR to the original call.
